entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:11 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
